trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> objects.
All objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> have an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> named <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 모든 개체 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 가 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 라는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: All objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> have an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> named <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 모든 개체 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> 가 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 라는 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> rather than direct <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 이러한 컬렉션 설정 된 경우 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], 컬렉션의 항목의 파생된 클래스 여야 합니다. 그런 다음 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 것이 아니라 직접 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> does not support a default public constructor.
trans-unit.target: 즉, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 기본 public 생성자를 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 항목에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 에 설정 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 파생 클래스는 기본 public 생성자와 같은 지 원하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and associates it with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> 에 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> class.
[Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> class.
The collection whose items are copied to the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> class using the items in the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />의 항목을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The binding to add to the collection.
Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
Always returns 0.
This deviates from the standard <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> implementation for <see langword="Add" />, which should return the index where the new item was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 이것은 컬렉션에 새 항목이 추가된 인덱스를 반환해야 하는 <see langword="Add" />에 대한 표준 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 구현과는 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and associates it with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> 에 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>.

The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.Add%2A>, but <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.Add%2A> is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 예제에서는 직접 사용 하지 않는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.Add%2A>, 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.Add%2A> 암시적으로 호출는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 컬렉션에 대 한 지원을 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 내용은 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 컬렉션, 참조 및 [XAML 개요 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inputBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The collection of items to add to the end of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
Adds the items of the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> to the end of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />의 항목을 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />의 끝에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
The binding to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> is in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" />가 해당 컬렉션에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection is copied.
The index position in <c>inputBindings</c> at which copying starts.
Copies all of the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> to the specified one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 대상 배열의 지정된 인덱스부터 시작하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />의 모든 항목을 지정된 1차원 배열에 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inputBindings" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> items in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> 항목의 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
The enumerator for this collection.
The object to locate in the collection.
Searches for the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> in his <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" />에서 첫 번째로 나타나는 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />을 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩이 있으면 첫 번째로 나타나는 <paramref name="value" />의 인덱스이고, 그렇지 않으면 -1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>inputBinding</c>.
The binding to insert.
Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> into this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" />의 지정된 인덱스 위치에 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />을 삽입합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inputBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />의 크기가 고정되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 크기가 고정되어 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> is never a fixed size; therefore, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.IsFixedSize%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 는 크기가 고정된 되지 않습니다; 따라서 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.IsFixedSize%2A> 항상 반환 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />가 읽기 전용인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 읽기 전용이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> is never read-only; therefore, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 는 읽기 전용으로 설정 되지 않습니다; 따라서 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> 항상 반환 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" /> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />에 대한 액세스가 동기화되어 스레드로부터 안전하게 보호되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 스레드로부터 안전하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> 사용할 수는 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position in the collection.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> at the specified index.
The binding to remove.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" />에서 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />의 첫 번째 항목을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> to remove.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> at the specified index of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" />의 지정된 인덱스에 있는 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />에 대한 액세스를 동기화하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />에 대한 액세스를 동기화하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 복사한 내용을 받도록 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Array" />의 첫째 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)" />.
The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 목록에 있으면 <paramref name="value" />의 인덱스이고, 그렇지 않으면 -1입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />.
The element at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.
